results.title: Connect Microsoft Sentinel to Amazon Web Services to ingest AWS service log data
results.description: Use the AWS connector to delegate Microsoft Sentinel access to AWS resource logs, creating a trust relationship between Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Sentinel.

descriptions.content: Use the AWS connector to delegate Microsoft Sentinel access to AWS resource logs, creating a trust relationship between Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Sentinel.

results.title: Compare Storage Services on Azure and AWS - Azure Architecture Center
results.description: Review storage technology differences between Azure and AWS. Compare Azure Storage with S3, EBS, EFS, and Glacier.

descriptions.content: Review storage technology differences between Azure and AWS.
Compare Azure Storage with S3, EBS, EFS, and Glacier.

results.title: Connect your AWS account - Microsoft Defender for Cloud
results.description: Defend your AWS resources with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, a guide to set up and configure Defender for Cloud to protect your workloads in AWS.

descriptions.content: Defend your AWS resources with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, a guide to set up and configure Defender for Cloud to protect your workloads in AWS.
